hymn.title: If we take up the cross, will we but suffer pain
hymn.category: The Way of the Cross—The Meaning of the Cross

layout.singingstanza: If we take up the cross, will we but suf -- fer pain? Nay, if we bear the cross, be sure that we will die! The mean -- ing of the cross is that we may be slain; The cross ex -- pe -- ri -- enced the self will cru -- ci -- fy.

lyrics.stanza: If we take up the cross, will we but suffer pain? Nay, if we bear the cross, be sure that we will die! The meaning of the cross is that we may be slain; The cross experienced the self will crucify.

The cross's final goal, that God's will be fulfilled; His will's arch enemy is but the self of man. If self be done away and all the soul-life killed, God's will shall then prevail and prospered be His plan.
